body: oh my goz....what they did to the girl....he kill her already. damn....i thought there will be more moment where the girl will get brainwashing(both of them) oh my my my my my....i lost my appetite now to this manga now since that girl are no longer would get brain fuck or something like that. Damn, the only thing i wait this episode was to see how they're going to brain wash them both but they kill one of her and i lost my interested cuz of that. If this manga made by MUKAI Masayoshi it would be the best manga in history. I would called it MOTY(Manga of The Year).
